video.title: Nutri Ventures
video.synopsis: In a world where people no longer subsist on food, four kids set out to find the Nutri-Guardians and bring healthy eating habits back to the masses.

episodes.synopsis: On a class trip, Theo and his friends make a shocking discovery about Genex 100, the city's only food source.
episodes.title: Little Big Hero

episodes.synopsis: When the heroes find the Yellow Kingdom in the grip of Ty-Paw, Theo inspires its farmers to rise up against enslavement.
episodes.title: In Search of Energy

episodes.synopsis: Theo, Lena and Ben seek milk for the farmers of the Yellow Kingdom, but must first prove themselves worthy to Guardian White.
episodes.title: Super-Sonic White Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: The heroes return to the Yellow Kingdom to find most of its farmers hiding in the mountains, leaving only a few to fight Ty-Paw and his minions.
episodes.title: Freedom for the Yellow Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: The heroes' path to the Orange Kingdom takes them through the Sugar Kingdom, where they fall under sugar hypnosis and see things better than they are.
episodes.title: Sweet Taste of Danger

episodes.synopsis: Theo, Lena and Nina reluctantly follow Sid to the Orange Kingdom, where they'll create a potion to free Ben from the Sugar Kingdom.
episodes.title: The Magic of Fruit

episodes.synopsis: Sid and the heroes return to the Sugar Kingdom, where they attempt to rescue Ben with the help of a band of rebels.
episodes.title: Big Ben

episodes.synopsis: The Scruffy Moles hatch a plan to destroy the antenna hypnotizing all of the Sugar Kingdom, but it will mean taking on some powerful opposition.
episodes.title: Ready to Roll

episodes.synopsis: The Roller Heroes enter the semifinals, but two teams from the Sugar Kingdom stand between them and the chance to destroy the hypnotizing antenna.
episodes.title: Tough to Crack

episodes.synopsis: The Candy Bowl finals arrive, and the Roller Heroes face the Gladiators, whose owner, Candyman, will stop at nothing to win.
episodes.title: Bitter Taste of Victory

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in the Sugar Kingdom, the heroes must escape in time to prevent Alex Grand from using the hypnotizing antenna to rule the world.
episodes.title: Alex Grand's Galaxy
